privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy for Networking Toolbox - how we handle your data
privacy.ogDescription: Learn about how Networking Toolbox handles your data and privacy

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.lead: Your privacy matters. Actually, that's one of the reasons that I built this (and my other apps). I believe you should have total transparency of how an app works (e.g. access to it's code), and full control over your data. So, weather you're self-hosting Networking Toolbox, or using the public instance, you can be sure that your data is handled with care.

principles.title: Principles
items: We only collect the minimum data needed for things to work
We never store anything which isn't 100% necessary
Any stored data stays local in your browser or is encrypted with your own key (we can't access it)
We don't use cookies or tracking of any kind
We never share your data with anyone else
We're transparent about what's collected, stored, used and why
Our code is fully open source, so you can verify our claims for yourself

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Networking Toolbox is designed with privacy in mind. All network calculations and most diagnostic tools run entirely in your browser, meaning your data never leaves your device.

clientSide.title: Client-Side Processing
clientSide.description: The majority of tools (CIDR calculators, IP converters, subnet planners, etc.) perform all calculations locally in your browser. No data from these tools is transmitted to any server.

serverSide.title: Server-Side Diagnostic Tools
serverSide.description: Some diagnostic tools (DNS lookups, DNSBL checks, TLS tests, etc.) require server-side processing to query external services. For these tools:
items: Only the specific domain or IP address you enter is sent to our server
Data is processed in real-time and not stored permanently
Requests may be temporarily logged for debugging purposes (logs are automatically purged)
No personally identifiable information is collected

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: We use browser localStorage (not cookies) to save your preferences locally. This data never leaves your device and can be cleared at any time through your browser settings.

items.title: Theme settings:
items.description: Your chosen color theme and accessibility preferences

items.title: Bookmarked tools:
items.description: Your saved favorite tools for quick access

localStorage.note: All localStorage usage is optional and strictly for your convenience. The application works without it.

analytics.title: Analytics & Tracking
analytics.description: Unless disabled, we log basic anonymous usage statistics using a self-hosted Plausible Analytics instance. This helps us understand which features are most useful and improve the application.

features.title: Privacy-focused:
features.description: No cookies, no tracking across sites, no personal data collection

features.title: Anonymous only:
features.description: We only collect page views and referrer information - no IP addresses, user agents, or any personally identifiable information

features.title: Self-hosted:
features.description: Analytics data stays on our infrastructure and is never shared with third parties

features.title: Opt-out:
features.description: You can disable analytics by enabling "Do Not Track" in your browser settings

analytics.note: We do not use any third-party advertising services or tracking scripts that follow you across the web.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: When using diagnostic tools, your queries may be sent to third-party services:

services.title: DNS queries:
services.description: Public DNS resolvers (Google, Cloudflare, Quad9, etc.)

thirdParty.note: These services have their own privacy policies and are outside our control.

selfHosting.title: Self-Hosting
selfHosting.description: For maximum privacy, you can self-host Networking Toolbox. When self-hosted, you have complete control over all data processing and server logs. See the {deployingLink} for instructions.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Networking Toolbox is fully open source. You can review the code to verify our privacy practices:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: This privacy policy may be updated occasionally. Significant changes will be noted in the {changelogLink}.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please open an issue on {githubLink}.
